memberdef.name: SOXR_TPDF
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Applicable only if otype is INT16. */

memberdef.name: SOXR_DOUBLE_PRECISION
memberdef.initializer: 16u /* Use D.P. calcs even if precision <= 20. */

memberdef.name: SOXR_COEF_INTERP_LOW
memberdef.initializer: 1u /* Man. select: less CPU, more memory. */

memberdef.name: SOXR_COEF_INTERP_HIGH
memberdef.initializer: 2u /* Man. select: more CPU, less memory. */
